title:
Mass spectrum in AdS$_4\times U(1)\setminus U(3)/U(1) $ compactification
  using harmonic analysis
abstract:
In this paper we present the Kaluza-Klein mass spectrum of 0-form and 1-form
fields that appear in AdS$_4\times B_7$ compactification of $d=11$
supergravity, where, $B_7=U(1)\setminus U(3)/ U(1)$. This theory belongs to the
class of gravity duals to three dimensional quiver Chern-Simons matter theories
as demonstrated by D.L Jafferis and A. Tomasiello in \cite{jaff}
